ComicInfo.Title: People Get Ready
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the aftermath of the riot, Icon prepares to leave Earth—this time for good. But who is his mysterious stowaway?
Buck Wild is dead. But we can't let him off that easy! " Funeral for a Fool" features a retrospective on the life and career of the mercenary man for hire.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 09:29:46. [CVDB163300]
ComicInfo.Inker: Mike Gustovich, Prentis Rollins, M. D. Bright, Caesar Rodriguez, Ravil Lopez, Caesar Antomattei, Mark Bright
ComicInfo.Colorist: Julia Lacquement, Andrew Burrell, David Montoya, Micheline Hess, Jason Scott Jones
ComicInfo.Characters: Buck Wild, Cockroach Andy, Darnice, Icon, Kingfish, Lysistrata Jones, Patriot, Rocket, Sweetstick Max
